title: Rp for art? only need 12 :D
body:
Hi so i currently have 108 rp and would love to buy a hextech chest. [](http://file:///C:/Users/rithik.dias/Pictures/Untitled.png)

hey just realised that i can count and i need 1 7 rp not 12 sorry :D

replies.body:
They do sometimes, but there are a few things you should know.

1. Go through support with this, you can open a ticket [HERE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

2. There is no guarantee they will agree, Riot has no obligation to give you anything.

3. You will have a much better chance if you submit a piece of artwork (attach it as a jpeg or png)

4. This is a one time deal. Riot will only do this for you once. 

Good luck ♥
